QuestData.Title: Shadows Awaken
QuestData.Description: We've managed to pin Ner'zhul inside the Observatory, but he's taken many down with him.$B$BHe has taken Yrel's sister, Samaara.$B$BI am needed to hold the line here. Please, do whatever you can to save her, hero.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Shadowmoon clan's aggression began when the Iron Horde arrived on Draenor.
QuestData.RewardText: Your aid in retaking Teluuna Observatory has not gone unnoticed, hero. I grow increasingly impressed at your prowess in battle.$B$BPerhaps you could share some of your knowledge with my disciples. They could learn much from a seasoned adventurer such as yourself.$B$BI have something for you, as a thanks for what you've done even in the short time you've been here. Perhaps it will help you get this garrison of yours on its feet.
